subject: GHOST BOX
author: John
full_text:
Hi everyone,
I am new to ghost boxs but I would like to build one. I have the radio 
shack radio but not sure where to get the white noise generator like in 
video 
http://www.angelsghosts.com/radio_shack_hack_ghost_box_video_12470_1
Can anyone help me locate white noise for ghost box.
Thank U
